endpoints.title: Get All Items
endpoints.description: Fetches a list of all items available in the inventory.

queryParameters.name: search
queryParameters.description: Search term to filter items by name.

queryParameters.name: limit
queryParameters.description: Limit the number of items returned.

endpoints.title: Get All Variants by Item ID
endpoints.description: Fetches all variants for a specific item.

bodyParameters.name: lineItems
bodyParameters.description: List of line items in the sale.

properties.name: variantId
properties.description: ID of the variant of the item being sold.

properties.name: quantity
properties.description: Quantity of the item being sold.

properties.name: price
properties.description: Price per unit of the item.

properties.name: total
properties.description: Total price for this line item (quantity * price).

properties.name: modifierSet
properties.description: Modifier set applied to the item, if any.

bodyParameters.name: subtotal
bodyParameters.description: Subtotal amount before tax and discount.

bodyParameters.name: grandTotal
bodyParameters.description: Total amount after tax and discount.

bodyParameters.name: paymentMethod
bodyParameters.description: Payment method used for the sale.

bodyParameters.name: cashReceived
bodyParameters.description: Amount of cash received from the customer.

endpoints.title: Get all sales
endpoints.description: Fetches a list of all sales records.

endpoints.title: Get sale by ID
endpoints.description: Fetches details of a specific sale by its ID.
